sentences.en: At Oxford and Cambridge each student has two tutors, an academic tutor and a morals tutor.
sentences.cn: 在牛津剑桥,每个学生有两个导师, 一位学业导师,一位道德导师(Moraltutor).

sentences.en: Handsome and intelligent, he was his father's favourite. His private tutor also spoke highly of him.
sentences.cn: 他的相貌清秀,自小就很聪慧, 在家里得着双亲的钟爱, 在私塾得到先生的赞美.

sentences.en: He is course tutor in archaeology at the University of Southampton.
sentences.cn: 他是南安普敦大学考古学课程导师。
他在导师的辅导下搞研究.

sentences.en: He was my personal tutor at university.
sentences.cn: 他是我大学时的个人指导教师。

sentences.en: Her tutor says she is making good progress.
sentences.cn: 她的导师说她进步很大.

sentences.en: Her tutor teaches her at home.
sentences.cn: 她的家庭教师在家里教她.

sentences.en: His parents employed a tutor to teach him mathematics.
sentences.cn: 他的父母雇了一位家庭教师教他数学.

sentences.en: It was to the scandal of Mr. Buck the tutor that Pen's extravagances became known.
sentences.cn: 潘的挥霍成性,导师巴克先生知道以后非常生气.

sentences.en: Mr. Bell was famous in the University for his learning and skill as a tutor.
sentences.cn: 贝尔先生的学问和当辅导员老师的能耐,在学校里是众所周知的.

sentences.en: She was my tutor at Durham.
sentences.cn: 她是我在达勒姆大学时的导师。

sentences.en: The boy was taken in the charge of his tutor.
sentences.cn: 这男孩受他的家庭教师管理.

sentences.en: The children were educated at home by a succession of tutors.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子在家接受教育，连续请过几任家庭教师。

sentences.en: The faithless tutor entertained him with sentimental conversations in place of lectures on algebra and Greek.
sentences.cn: 这位不忠实的老师,用充满感情的谈话代替代数和希腊文来使他欢心.

sentences.en: The tutor flayed the idle students.
sentences.cn: 导师严厉地斥责了不用功的学生.

sentences.en: There is a tutor to teach the children while they're in hospital.
sentences.cn: 在孩子们住院期间,有个私人教师给他们上课.
他们聘用了一名住家的家庭教师.

words.tran_cn: 辅导的；家庭教师的，个别指导的

trans.tran_cn: 家庭教师，导师，教师，助教，课本
trans.tran_en: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them
to teach someone as a tutor
to teach someone as a tutor
